lines.text: We will now proceed with our history lesson. Lulu?

[after shooting a rubber band at Tubby]
Yes, sir?
In what year did the pilgrims land?

[reads Tubby's sign]
1492.
1492? Then when did Columbus discover America?

[reads Tubby's sign]
1776.
Wrong again! Lulu, when did Ben Franklin die?
Gee, did he die? I didn't know he was even sick.
Pardon me, I'm Lulu and I'm looking for Tubby.

[disguised]
Well I'm-a Columbus and I'm a-looking for America.
[sees America]
Gazooks, what a-strange land is this?
The Red Coats are coming!
Don't shoot till you see the whites of their eyes!
[puts on sunglasses]
But where are the Indians?
We're in the American League, Woo-Woo!

[the Indians come out of the fountain of youth]
1 little 2 little 3 little Indians. 4 little 5 little 6 little Indians. 7 little 8 little 9 little Indians...

[pops up]
10 little Indian boys!

[fanning Tubby's rear end, which is red and sore]
Boy, you sure stuck your neck out that time!
[laughs]
